leaf_cluster_name: 物理仿真-CFD 求解器与湍流生态
task_chain: 网格→求解→模型→后处理→验证→UQ

tools.name: LB-t
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-threaded object-oriented LBM CFD solver for 3D incompressible flows
tools.detailed_description: A computational fluid dynamics code implementing the Lattice-Boltzmann method (LBM) for three-dimensional incompressible fluid flow. It supports general lattices (D2Q9, D3Q15, etc.) and is written in C++17 with OpenMP parallelization.

tools.name: PeleC
tools.one_line_profile: AMR code for compressible reacting flow simulations
tools.detailed_description: An adaptive mesh refinement (AMR) solver for compressible reacting flows, built on the AMReX framework. It is designed for high-performance simulations of combustion and compressible fluid dynamics.

tools.name: CAMR
tools.one_line_profile: AMR code for compressible flow simulation
tools.detailed_description: A compressible flow solver utilizing adaptive mesh refinement (AMR), part of the AMReX-Fluids ecosystem. It serves as a core component for simulating compressible fluid dynamics phenomena.

tools.name: IAMR
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel AMR code for variable-density incompressible Navier-Stokes equations
tools.detailed_description: A parallel, adaptive mesh refinement (AMR) code that solves the variable-density incompressible Navier-Stokes equations. It is built on the AMReX framework and is suitable for large-scale fluid simulations.

tools.name: incflo
tools.one_line_profile: Incompressible Navier-Stokes solver for complex geometries
tools.detailed_description: An incompressible Navier-Stokes solver designed for complex geometries, leveraging the AMReX framework for adaptive mesh refinement. It is often used in coupled multi-physics simulations.

tools.name: Basilisk (Astrodynamics)
tools.one_line_profile: Astrodynamics simulation framework
tools.detailed_description: A modular and fast astrodynamics simulation framework capable of simulating complex spacecraft dynamics and control systems. Note: This is distinct from the CFD solver also named Basilisk.

tools.name: bsk_rl
tools.one_line_profile: RL environments and tools for spacecraft autonomy research
tools.detailed_description: A library providing Reinforcement Learning (RL) environments and tools for spacecraft autonomy research, built on top of the Basilisk astrodynamics framework.

tools.name: DLBFoam
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic load balancing model for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: An open-source dynamic load balancing library for OpenFOAM, specifically optimized for fast reacting flow simulations with uneven computational loads.

tools.name: AMR-LBM-OpenMP-2D
tools.one_line_profile: AMR-LBM solver for multiphase flows
tools.detailed_description: A numerical simulation tool utilizing the Lattice-Boltzmann Method (LBM) with Adaptive Mesh Refinement (AMR) for multiphase flows, parallelized with OpenMP.

tools.name: Improved_Phase-Field_LBM_2D
tools.one_line_profile: Improved conservative phase-field LBM code for multiphase flows
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran implementation of an improved conservative phase-field Lattice Boltzmann Method for simulating multiphase flows in 2D periodic domains.

tools.name: flowTorch
tools.one_line_profile: Library for analysis and reduced-order modeling of fluid flows
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for the analysis and reduced-order modeling (ROM) of fluid flow data, integrating with PyTorch for machine learning applications in fluid dynamics.

tools.name: pimpleTKEBudgetFoam
tools.one_line_profile: OpenFOAM solver for runtime turbulence statistics
tools.detailed_description: An OpenFOAM solver extension to calculate resolved Reynolds stress, turbulent kinetic energy, and dissipation rate at runtime during Large Eddy Simulations (LES).

tools.name: Omega2D
tools.one_line_profile: 2D flow solver using vortex particle and boundary element methods
tools.detailed_description: A two-dimensional fluid flow solver featuring a GUI, utilizing vortex particle methods and boundary element methods for simulation.

tools.name: XLB
tools.one_line_profile: Accelerated Lattice Boltzmann for Physics-based ML
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance, differentiable Lattice Boltzmann Method (LBM) solver implemented in JAX, designed for physics-based machine learning and inverse design problems.

tools.name: VISCOPLASTIC-LBM
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated LBM software for flow simulation
tools.detailed_description: A Lattice Boltzmann Method (LBM) software package for fluid flow simulation, featuring GPU acceleration for high performance.

tools.name: TCLB
tools.one_line_profile: Templated MPI+CUDA/CPU Lattice Boltzmann code
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance, templated Lattice Boltzmann Method (LBM) solver supporting MPI and CUDA/CPU execution for large-scale fluid simulations.

tools.name: Euler2D-KFVS
tools.one_line_profile: 2D Euler equations solver using kinetic flux vector splitting
tools.detailed_description: A 2D solver for Euler equations on quadrilateral grids, utilizing the kinetic flux vector splitting (KFVS) scheme, written in Object-Oriented Fortran 2003.

tools.name: CaLES
tools.one_line_profile: Canonical direct and large-eddy simulation solver
tools.detailed_description: A solver for canonical direct numerical simulations (DNS) and large-eddy simulations (LES), part of the CaNS ecosystem for high-fidelity fluid dynamics.

tools.name: CaNS
tools.one_line_profile: Fast, massively-parallel DNS code for canonical flows
tools.detailed_description: A code designed for fast, massively-parallel Direct Numerical Simulations (DNS) of canonical fluid flows, widely used in turbulence research.

tools.name: Tsunamis.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel Shallow Water Equations Solver in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia-based solver for Shallow Water Equations using the Finite Volume Method and HLLE Riemann Solver, supporting parallel execution.

tools.name: sdfibm
tools.one_line_profile: Immersed boundary method empowered by signed distance field and OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Immersed Boundary Method (IBM) using Signed Distance Fields (SDF), integrated with OpenFOAM for simulating flows around complex geometries.

tools.name: jflowsim

tools.name: LESbrary.jl

tools.name: OpenCFDinCUDA

tools.detailed_description: A research implementation (3DV 2026) for generating 3D meshes from images or text prompts. While focused on 'artistic' generation, it represents a scientific advancement in geometric deep learning and mesh synthesis.

tools.name: 2DAMRSWE
tools.one_line_profile: Finite-volume solver for 2D shallow-water equations with AMR
tools.detailed_description: A parallel finite-volume solver for the two-dimensional Shallow Water Equations (SWE) incorporating Adaptive Mesh Refinement (AMR). It is suitable for simulating free-surface flows in hydrodynamics.

tools.name: BoundingVolumeHierarchies.jl
tools.one_line_profile: BVH implementation for triangular meshes in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library implementing Bounding Volume Hierarchies (BVH) to accelerate geometric queries, such as line segment intersections with triangular meshes. It is a fundamental building block for ray tracing and physics simulations.

tools.name: XtalMesh
tools.one_line_profile: High-fidelity mesh generation of polycrystals
tools.detailed_description: A specialized tool for generating high-quality finite element meshes of polycrystalline microstructures. It is used in materials science to simulate the mechanical and physical behavior of crystalline materials.

tools.name: qgis-gmsh
tools.one_line_profile: QGIS plugin to interact with Gmsh
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the QGIS geographic information system that provides an interface to the Gmsh mesh generator, allowing users to create meshes directly from GIS data layers.

tools.name: enlightning
tools.one_line_profile: Navier-Stokes solver for atmospheric shockwaves with AMR
tools.detailed_description: A numerical software for simulating atmospheric shockwaves and thunder propagation using the Navier-Stokes equations. It employs a hybrid WENO/DRP scheme and Adaptive Mesh Refinement (AMR) for high-fidelity acoustics simulation.

tools.name: mushy-layer
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation code for convection in mushy layers with AMR
tools.detailed_description: A scientific code (SOFTBALL) for simulating solidification, flow, and thermodynamics in binary alloys, specifically focusing on convection in mushy layers. It utilizes Adaptive Mesh Refinement to resolve complex phase change interfaces.

tools.name: salomeToElmer
tools.one_line_profile: Script for exporting mesh from Salome to Elmer FEM
tools.detailed_description: A utility script that converts meshes generated in the Salome platform into a format compatible with Elmer FEM solver, facilitating the workflow between these open-source engineering tools.

tools.name: NeuFace
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale 3D face mesh video dataset and optimization method
tools.detailed_description: The official repository for the NeuFace paper, providing a large-scale dataset and neural re-parameterized optimization code for 3D face mesh reconstruction from video. It serves as a tool and benchmark for computer vision research.

tools.name: MicroStructPy
tools.one_line_profile: Microstructure modeling and mesh generation tool for materials science
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for microstructure modeling, mesh generation, analysis, and visualization, specifically designed for polycrystalline materials and composites.

tools.name: MeshAC
tools.one_line_profile: 3D mesh generation and adaptation for multiscale materials simulation
tools.detailed_description: A package for 3D mesh generation and adaptation, specifically tailored for multiscale coupling simulations of material defects.

tools.name: TriangleMesh.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia interface for 2D triangular mesh generation and refinement
tools.detailed_description: A Julia wrapper for generating and refining unstructured 2D triangular meshes from polygons, likely wrapping the Triangle library.

tools.name: dynamicRefine2DFvMesh
tools.one_line_profile: 2D adaptive mesh refinement library for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A library for performing adaptive mesh refinement (AMR) in OpenFOAM specifically for 2-dimensional problems.

tools.name: SeismicMesh
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel 2D/3D triangular mesh generator for seismology
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating 2D and 3D triangular meshes for finite element methods, optimized for seismic and geophysical applications.

tools.name: pydelatin
tools.one_line_profile: Fast terrain mesh generation bindings for Python
tools.detailed_description: Python bindings to the `hmm` library for fast terrain mesh generation, useful in geospatial analysis and visualization.

tools.name: pymartini
tools.one_line_profile: Fast RTIN terrain mesh generation for Python
tools.detailed_description: A Cython port of Martini, providing fast Right-Triangulated Irregular Network (RTIN) terrain mesh generation.

tools.name: spaceMARINE
tools.one_line_profile: Hydrodynamic solver with Adaptive Mesh Refinement
tools.detailed_description: A solver for 2D/3D hydrodynamic problems in an Eulerian framework on a Cartesian grid, utilizing BoxLib for Adaptive Mesh Refinement.

tools.name: CELLAR
tools.one_line_profile: Cell-based adaptive mesh refinement framework
tools.detailed_description: The CELL Adaptive mesh Refinement (CELLAR) application provides data structures and execution models for cell-based AMR on parallel architectures.

tools.name: CLAMR
tools.one_line_profile: Cell-Based Adaptive Mesh Refinement mini-app
tools.detailed_description: A mini-app for studying cell-based adaptive mesh refinement algorithms and performance on various computing architectures.

tools.name: LaGriT
tools.one_line_profile: Los Alamos Grid Toolbox for mesh generation and optimization
tools.detailed_description: A library of user-callable tools for mesh generation, mesh optimization, and dynamic mesh maintenance in 2D and 3D.

tools.name: PENNANT
tools.one_line_profile: Unstructured mesh hydrodynamics mini-app
tools.detailed_description: A mini-app for unstructured mesh hydrodynamics designed to test advanced computer architectures.

tools.name: UME
tools.one_line_profile: Unstructured Mesh Explorations library
tools.detailed_description: A library/framework for exploring and testing unstructured mesh data structures and algorithms.

tools.name: jali
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel unstructured mesh framework for multiphysics
tools.detailed_description: A parallel unstructured mesh framework designed to support multiphysics applications.

tools.name: tinerator
tools.one_line_profile: Geospatial mesh generation tool from GIS data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating unstructured geospatial meshes directly from GIS data, suitable for hydrological and geological simulations.

tools.name: tycho2
tools.one_line_profile: Neutral particle transport mini-app on unstructured meshes
tools.detailed_description: A mini-app for studying the performance of sweeps on unstructured 3D tetrahedral meshes for neutral particle transport.

tools.name: SlicerSegmentMesher
tools.one_line_profile: Volumetric mesh generation extension for 3D Slicer
tools.detailed_description: An extension for 3D Slicer to create volumetric meshes from segmentation data using Cleaver2 or TetGen, useful for medical physics and biomechanics.

tools.name: Visual_Driven_Mesh_Repair
tools.one_line_profile: Visual driven global optimization for mesh repair
tools.detailed_description: A tool for repairing man-made meshes via visual driven global optimization with minimum intrusion, addressing topological and geometric defects.

tools.name: MMGenBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for multi-modal generation models
tools.detailed_description: The official repository for MMGenBench, a comprehensive benchmark for evaluating multi-modal generative models (AI for Science/AI Research).

tools.name: tetgen
tools.one_line_profile: Quality tetrahedral mesh generator and 3D Delaunay triangulator
tools.detailed_description: A mirror of the TetGen library, a robust tool for generating quality tetrahedral meshes and 3D Delaunay triangulations.

tools.name: gmsh
tools.one_line_profile: Three-dimensional finite element mesh generator
tools.detailed_description: A live clone of Gmsh, a 3D finite element mesh generator with built-in pre- and post-processing facilities.

tools.name: meshgpt-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: MeshGPT implementation for generative mesh modeling
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of MeshGPT, a state-of-the-art transformer-based model for generating 3D meshes.

tools.name: delatin
tools.one_line_profile: Fast JavaScript terrain mesh generation tool
tools.detailed_description: A fast JavaScript tool for terrain mesh generation based on Delaunay triangulation, approximating heightfields with minimal error.

tools.name: martini
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time RTIN terrain mesh generation library
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library for fast, real-time terrain mesh generation using Right-Triangulated Irregular Networks (RTIN).

tools.name: PyGeM
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for geometrical morphing and deformation
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for geometrical morphing techniques such as Free Form Deformation (FFD), Radial Basis Functions (RBF), and Inverse Distance Weighting (IDW).

tools.name: pyems
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for OpenEMS with mesh generation
tools.detailed_description: A high-level Python interface to the OpenEMS electromagnetic field solver, featuring automatic mesh generation capabilities.

tools.name: roribloco
tools.one_line_profile: GUI tool for OpenFOAM blockMeshDict generation
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface tool designed to facilitate the generation of blockMeshDict files for OpenFOAM mesh generation.

tools.name: pyhyp
tools.one_line_profile: Hyperbolic volume mesh generator
tools.detailed_description: A tool that generates volume meshes from surface meshes using hyperbolic marching methods, developed by MDO Lab.

tools.name: optimesh
tools.one_line_profile: Mesh optimization and smoothing tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for mesh optimization and smoothing, implementing various algorithms like Centroidal Voronoi Tessellation (CVT) and Optimal Delaunay Triangulation (ODT).

tools.name: MFEM
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight, general, scalable C++ library for finite element methods
tools.detailed_description: MFEM is a modular parallel C++ library for finite element methods. It features arbitrary high-order finite element meshes and spaces, support for a wide variety of discretization methods, and parallel scalability.

tools.name: ship_mmg
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based simulator for ship maneuvering based on the MMG model
tools.detailed_description: A simulator implementing the Maneuvering Modeling Group (MMG) model for predicting ship maneuverability. It provides a web-based interface for running simulations based on hydrodynamic coefficients.

tools.name: cinolib
tools.one_line_profile: A generic programming header-only C++ library for processing polygonal and polyhedral meshes
tools.detailed_description: Cinolib is a C++ library for processing surface and volumetric meshes. It supports various mesh types (trimesh, quadmesh, tetmesh, hexmesh, etc.) and provides algorithms for geometry processing, making it suitable for pre-processing in simulations.

tools.name: HAMeRS
tools.one_line_profile: Hydrodynamics Adaptive Mesh Refinement Simulator for compressible flows
tools.detailed_description: HAMeRS is a simulator for compressible multi-species/multi-phase simulations utilizing adaptive mesh refinement (AMR) techniques to resolve flow features efficiently.

tools.name: p3d2gmsh
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from NASA's Plot3D mesh format to Gmsh's MSH format
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool to convert computational grids in NASA's Plot3D format (commonly used in CFD) into the Gmsh MSH format, facilitating interoperability between mesh generators and solvers.

tools.name: pyrefine
tools.one_line_profile: Python scripting interface for CFD mesh adaptation with refine
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface developed by NASA for 'refine', a mesh adaptation tool. It allows for scripting and automation of mesh adaptation processes in computational fluid dynamics workflows.

tools.name: SOLVERLAB
tools.one_line_profile: PDE solver lab using SALOME/MEDCoupling meshes and PETSc matrices
tools.detailed_description: SOLVERLAB is a development environment for Partial Differential Equation (PDE) solvers. It integrates mesh management via SALOME/MEDCoupling and linear algebra via PETSc, providing a framework for scientific computing.

tools.name: Neper
tools.one_line_profile: Software for polycrystal generation and meshing
tools.detailed_description: Neper is a software package for generating and meshing polycrystals. It can generate synthetic microstructures with specific statistical properties and create high-quality meshes for finite element analysis.

tools.name: nii2mesh
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to convert NIfTI medical volumes to triangulated meshes
tools.detailed_description: A C utility that converts NIfTI volume data (commonly used in medical imaging) into triangulated meshes (OBJ, STL, etc.) using the marching cubes algorithm, facilitating the use of medical data in simulation and visualization.

tools.name: GradientAMR
tools.one_line_profile: Gradient-based Adaptive Mesh Refinement (AMR) criteria for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A library and set of examples for OpenFOAM that implements Adaptive Mesh Refinement (AMR) strategies based on the gradient of flow variables, improving simulation efficiency by refining meshes only where necessary.

tools.name: salomeToOpenFOAM
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from Salome mesh format to OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A Python script designed to bridge the gap between the Salome platform (pre-processing/meshing) and OpenFOAM (CFD solver) by converting mesh files, facilitating the workflow between these two open-source scientific tools.

tools.name: volume_distribution
tools.one_line_profile: Algorithm for distributing 3D vectors inside a mesh
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for generating distributions of 3D vectors within a mesh volume, useful for particle seeding, initial condition generation, or sampling in scientific simulations.

tools.name: mmgdynamics
tools.one_line_profile: MMG Standard model for ship maneuvering simulation
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the MMG (Manoeuvring Modelling Group) standard model for simulating ship maneuvering dynamics, including extensions for environmental factors like currents, winds, and shallow water.

tools.name: discretization-robust-correspondence-benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for 3D ML models across surface remeshing
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking tool and dataset designed to evaluate the robustness of 3D machine learning models against different surface discretizations and remeshing, aiding in the development of geometry-aware AI models.

tools.name: Gmsh.Net
tools.one_line_profile: .NET wrapper for the Gmsh mesh generator
tools.detailed_description: A C# wrapper for the Gmsh library, enabling .NET developers to utilize Gmsh's powerful finite element mesh generation capabilities within their scientific or engineering applications.

tools.name: pygmsh
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for Gmsh
tools.detailed_description: A popular Python library that provides a pythonic interface to Gmsh, allowing users to generate complex finite element meshes using Python scripts, widely used in scientific computing workflows.

tools.name: LLaMA-Mesh
tools.one_line_profile: Unified 3D Mesh Generation with Language Models
tools.detailed_description: A research tool that adapts Large Language Models (LLMs) for 3D mesh generation, enabling the synthesis of 3D geometry from text prompts, bridging the gap between NLP and 3D scientific visualization/modeling.

tools.name: MMGX
tools.one_line_profile: Multiple Molecular Graph eXplainable Discovery
tools.detailed_description: A tool for molecular discovery using graph-based explainable AI methods, assisting researchers in understanding molecular properties and structures through graph representations.

tools.name: Cassiopee

tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library developed by ONERA for CFD pre- and post-processing, including mesh manipulation, CGNS tree handling, and data extraction, tailored for aerospace research.

tools.name: FreeTO

tools.name: MMGeneration
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for generative models based on PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A powerful toolkit from OpenMMLab for generative models (GANs, Diffusion, etc.), widely used in AI research for image synthesis and data augmentation, applicable to scientific data generation tasks.

tools.name: bitpit
tools.one_line_profile: Open source C++ library for scientific HPC
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library designed for high-performance computing in scientific applications, providing modules for mesh handling (octree, unstructured), parallel communication, and geometric operations, developed by Optimad.

tools.name: Surface-Remesher
tools.one_line_profile: Surface remeshing using Centroidal Voronoi Tessellation
tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool for high-quality surface remeshing based on Centroidal Voronoi Tessellation (CVT), useful for improving mesh quality in geometry processing and simulation workflows.

tools.name: Dendro-GR

tools.detailed_description: Dendro-GR is a framework for high-performance computational physics, specifically designed for numerical relativity. It utilizes octree-based wavelet adaptive mesh refinement (AMR) to solve Einstein's equations efficiently on large-scale supercomputers.

tools.name: AirfoilMesh
tools.one_line_profile: Glyph script for generating NACA airfoil geometries and meshes in Pointwise
tools.detailed_description: A specialized script for the Pointwise meshing software that automates the generation of NACA 4-series airfoil geometries and their associated boundary layer meshes, facilitating aerodynamic CFD simulations.

tools.name: VSP2CFD

tools.detailed_description: A utility tool that bridges NASA's OpenVSP geometry tool and Pointwise meshing software, allowing users to generate high-quality volume meshes for CFD from OpenVSP surface models.

tools.name: pyacvd

tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a wrapper around the ACVD (Approximated Centroidal Voronoi Diagrams) algorithm for uniform resampling of surface meshes, essential for improving mesh quality in scientific computing and visualization.

tools.name: scikit-gmsh
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for Gmsh to generate 3D finite element meshes
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a scikit-style interface to the Gmsh mesh generator, allowing users to define geometries and generate 3D finite element meshes programmatically within Python workflows.

tools.name: RAMSES

tools.detailed_description: A widely used open-source code for astrophysical simulations, employing Adaptive Mesh Refinement (AMR) to solve hydrodynamics and magnetohydrodynamics (MHD) equations with high resolution in regions of interest.

tools.name: gmsh_scripts

tools.name: PostMesh

tools.detailed_description: A Python 3 library that automates the creation and building of finite element analysis (FEA) models for the Calculix solver, supporting meshing via Calculix or GMSH.

tools.name: stellarmesh

tools.name: LaB-GATr

tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Geometric Algebra Transformers (GATr) optimized for processing large biomedical surface and volume meshes, enabling geometric deep learning on scientific data.

tools.detailed_description: A Blender add-on that serves as a graphical user interface for OpenFOAM's snappyHexMesh, facilitating the definition and export of mesh generation parameters directly from Blender.

tools.detailed_description: A Blender add-on enabling the import, visualization, and manipulation of unstructured 3D volume grids (meshes), supporting scientific visualization workflows within Blender.

tools.name: SMESH

tools.detailed_description: The extracted Mesh module from the Salome Platform, providing a comprehensive C++ library for mesh generation, editing, and management.

tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Julia wrapper for the p4est C library, enabling the management of multiple connected adaptive quadtrees/octrees in parallel for scientific simulations.

tools.name: City4CFD

tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to reconstruct Level of Detail 2 (LoD2) 3D city models specifically for use in urban Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) flow simulations.

tools.detailed_description: A utility program to convert between several mesh and FE field formats (ANSYS, Nastran, VTK, etc.) and transform finite element types. It also includes bandwidth optimization capabilities using the Cuthill-McKee algorithm.

tools.name: umeshu

tools.detailed_description: A simple C++ library for generating unstructured meshes in 2-D using Delaunay refinement algorithms. It is designed to be light-weight and easy to integrate for planar mesh generation tasks.

tools.name: Pixel2Mesh++

tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Pixel2Mesh++ algorithm which generates high-quality 3D meshes from multi-view images through a deformation-based approach. It serves as a tool for AI-driven geometry reconstruction and mesh generation.

tools.name: fast-envelope

tools.name: PartCrafter

tools.name: MMGDreamer

tools.name: pystella

tools.name: Basilisk

tools.name: ClimaAtmos.jl

tools.name: TurbulenceConvection.jl

tools.name: Eigentools

tools.name: Nalu-Wind

tools.name: RANS_Channel

tools.name: react-vtk-js
tools.one_line_profile: React components for vtk.js visualization
tools.detailed_description: A declarative library that exposes the vtk.js visualization pipeline as React components, facilitating the integration of scientific visualization into React applications.

tools.name: trame
tools.one_line_profile: Python framework for building interactive web applications
tools.detailed_description: A framework that allows creating interactive web applications solely in Python, heavily used for building scientific visualization tools wrapping VTK and ParaView.

tools.name: trame-vtk
tools.one_line_profile: VTK and ParaView widgets for Trame
tools.detailed_description: A library providing VTK and ParaView specific widgets and components for the Trame framework, enabling 3D visualization in Trame apps.

tools.name: vtk-js
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript implementation of the Visualization Toolkit (VTK) for web-based scientific visualization
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library that provides a subset of the VTK C++ library's functionality, enabling 3D scientific visualization and data processing directly in web browsers using WebGL.

tools.name: SlicerVirtualReality
tools.one_line_profile: Virtual Reality extension for 3D Slicer medical imaging platform
tools.detailed_description: An extension for 3D Slicer that enables users to interact with medical scenes and scientific visualizations using virtual reality headsets, enhancing spatial understanding of complex anatomical structures.

tools.name: ParaView-MCP
tools.one_line_profile: LLM integration for ParaView via Model Context Protocol
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by LLNL that integrates multimodal Large Language Models with ParaView, enabling natural language control and intelligent automation of scientific visualizations.

tools.name: LTRANS
tools.one_line_profile: Larval Transport Lagrangian particle-tracking model for ROMS
tools.detailed_description: An off-line Lagrangian particle-tracking model designed to simulate the transport of larvae or passive particles in the ocean, forced by hydrodynamic fields from the Regional Ocean Modeling System (ROMS).

tools.name: copper3d_visualisation
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based 3D visualization package for medical data
tools.detailed_description: A TypeScript package based on Three.js providing tools for loading DICOM files, NRRD segmentation, and exporting GLTF models, specifically tailored for medical 3D visualization.

tools.name: odb2vtk
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from Abaqus ODB to VTK format
tools.detailed_description: A Python script that converts Abaqus ODB simulation output files into VTK format, enabling post-processing and visualization of structural analysis results in ParaView.

tools.name: dsatools
tools.one_line_profile: Digital Signal Analysis library including DMD and EMD
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for digital signal analysis, processing, and parameter estimation, featuring implementations of Dynamic Mode Decomposition (DMD), Empirical Mode Decomposition (EMD), and other spectral analysis techniques relevant to physics and engineering.

tools.name: PySPOD
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for Spectral Proper Orthogonal Decomposition
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for performing Spectral Proper Orthogonal Decomposition (SPOD), a technique used in fluid dynamics for identifying coherent structures in turbulent flows.

tools.name: VAPOR
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization and Analysis Platform for Ocean, Atmosphere, and Solar Researchers
tools.detailed_description: An interactive 3D visualization and analysis platform developed by NCAR, specifically designed for exploring large-scale gridded datasets from oceanographic, atmospheric, and solar research simulations.

tools.name: ParaViewConnector
tools.one_line_profile: ParaView plugin for NVIDIA Omniverse connection
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for Kitware ParaView that adds support for NVIDIA Omniverse and USD (Universal Scene Description) export, enabling high-fidelity cinematic rendering of scientific datasets.

tools.name: ipyparaview
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter widget for server-side ParaView rendering
tools.detailed_description: An IPython widget that enables interactive server-side ParaView rendering directly within Jupyter notebooks, facilitating remote visualization of large scientific datasets.

tools.name: OHIF-VTKPlugin
tools.one_line_profile: VTK integration plugin for OHIF medical imaging viewer
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the OHIF (Open Health Imaging Foundation) Viewer that integrates VTK.js, enabling advanced 3D visualization capabilities within the medical imaging platform.

tools.name: ParaViewGeo
tools.one_line_profile: Geoscience visualization extension for ParaView
tools.detailed_description: A specialized visualization software/plugin based on ParaView, tailored for the needs of geoscientific data visualization and analysis.

tools.name: PVGeo
tools.one_line_profile: Python package of VTK-based algorithms for geoscientific data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides VTK-based algorithms and tools for processing, analyzing, and visualizing geoscientific data and models within the PyVista and ParaView ecosystems.

tools.name: openpiv-podbox
tools.one_line_profile: Proper Orthogonal Decomposition (POD) Toolbox for OpenPIV
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox associated with the OpenPIV project, providing tools for performing Proper Orthogonal Decomposition (POD) on Particle Image Velocimetry (PIV) data to analyze flow structures.

tools.name: PyDMD
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for Dynamic Mode Decomposition
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library for Dynamic Mode Decomposition (DMD), a data-driven method for extracting dynamic structures from high-dimensional data, widely used in fluid dynamics and physics.

tools.name: VaspPoscarMayavi
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for VASP POSCAR files using Mayavi
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that utilizes the Mayavi 3D visualization library to render atomic structures defined in VASP POSCAR files, aiding in material science and chemistry research.

tools.name: 3D Slicer
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive platform for medical image computing and visualization
tools.detailed_description: 3D Slicer is a free, open-source software platform for visualization, processing, and analysis of medical computing data. It supports a wide range of applications including image segmentation, registration, and 3D visualization of MRI, CT, and other medical imaging modalities.

tools.name: SPOD Matlab
tools.one_line_profile: Matlab implementation of Spectral Proper Orthogonal Decomposition
tools.detailed_description: This repository contains a Matlab implementation of Spectral Proper Orthogonal Decomposition (SPOD), a technique used for analyzing coherent structures in turbulent flows and other dynamical systems. It allows for the decomposition of space-time data into energy-ranked modes.

tools.name: TRACMASS
tools.one_line_profile: Lagrangian particle tracking code for ocean and atmospheric circulation
tools.detailed_description: TRACMASS is a Lagrangian particle tracking code designed to calculate particle trajectories using velocity fields from ocean or atmospheric circulation models. It is widely used for studying transport pathways, connectivity, and mixing in geophysical fluids.

tools.name: VisTrails
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific workflow and provenance management system
tools.detailed_description: VisTrails is an open-source scientific workflow management system that provides support for data exploration and visualization. It uniquely focuses on provenance, maintaining a detailed history of the steps followed and data derived during exploratory tasks.

tools.name: Viskores
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance visualization library for many-threaded devices
tools.detailed_description: Viskores is a visualization library designed for high-performance rendering on many-threaded devices (such as GPUs and many-core CPUs). It focuses on efficient data handling and rendering algorithms suitable for large-scale scientific data.

tools.name: sparse_dmd
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of Sparse Dynamic Mode Decomposition
tools.detailed_description: sparse_dmd is a Python library for performing Sparse Dynamic Mode Decomposition (DMD), a data-driven method for extracting dynamic structures from high-dimensional data, commonly used in fluid dynamics and other physical systems.

tools.name: 3d-nii-visualizer
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight 3D NIfTI visualizer based on VTK and Qt
tools.detailed_description: 3d-nii-visualizer is a desktop application for visualizing 3D medical imaging data in NIfTI format (nii.gz). It leverages VTK for rendering and Qt for the interface, providing a simple tool for inspecting volumetric data.

tools.name: Robopy
tools.one_line_profile: Python port of the Matlab Robotics Toolbox
tools.detailed_description: Robopy is a Python library that ports functionality from Peter Corke's Robotics Toolbox for MATLAB. It provides tools for kinematic analysis, trajectory generation, and visualization of robotic manipulators.

tools.name: CloudTool
tools.one_line_profile: 3D point cloud processing software based on PCL and Qt
tools.detailed_description: CloudTool is a software application for processing and visualizing 3D point cloud data. Built upon the Point Cloud Library (PCL) and Qt, it offers a graphical interface for various point cloud operations relevant to geoscience and computer vision.

tools.name: Postgkyl
tools.one_line_profile: Post-processing and visualization tool for Gkeyll plasma simulation data
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool designed specifically for post-processing data from the Gkeyll simulation framework (plasma physics). It supports plotting, data analysis, and conversion of Gkeyll's custom output formats.

tools.name: DFTQuantumDot
tools.one_line_profile: DFT solver and visualization for quantum dots
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation of Density Functional Theory (DFT) using a plane waves basis, specifically applied to quantum dots. It includes volumetric visualization capabilities for orbitals using VTK.

tools.name: NMRI
tools.one_line_profile: MRI raw data processing and 3D visualization tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for processing Nuclear Magnetic Resonance Imaging (NMRI) raw data using 2D Fourier Transforms and providing 3D visualization of the results via VTK.

tools.name: LPTlib
tools.one_line_profile: Lagrangian Particle Tracking library for CFD
tools.detailed_description: A library for Lagrangian Particle Tracking (LPT), developed by RIKEN AICS. It is used for tracking particles in fluid flow simulations, a key task in CFD post-processing and analysis.

tools.name: piDMD
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed Dynamic Mode Decomposition library
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB library for Physics-Informed Dynamic Mode Decomposition (piDMD). It allows users to enforce physical constraints (like symmetries, conservation laws) onto the DMD decomposition of fluid or physical data.

tools.name: rocket_viewer
tools.one_line_profile: Viewer for medical images, 3D surfaces, and biosignals
tools.detailed_description: A generic viewer developed by BCN MedTech for visualizing medical and biological data, including images, 3D surface meshes, and electric signals (ECGs).

tools.name: paraview-mfem-reader
tools.one_line_profile: ParaView plugin for reading MFEM mesh files
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for ParaView that enables the reading and visualization of mesh files from MFEM (Modular Finite Element Methods), bridging the gap between the MFEM solver and ParaView visualization.

tools.name: pv-meshless
tools.one_line_profile: ParaView plugin for particle and meshless datasets
tools.detailed_description: A ParaView plugin designed to handle and visualize particle-based or meshless simulation datasets (e.g., SPH), providing specialized rendering and filtering capabilities.

tools.name: dmd-neuro
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic Mode Decomposition for large-scale neural recordings
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB library adapted for computing Dynamic Mode Decomposition (DMD) on large-scale neural recording data, facilitating the analysis of brain dynamics.

tools.name: Cubit-CalculiX
tools.one_line_profile: CalculiX pre/post-processing integration for Coreform Cubit
tools.detailed_description: A component that integrates the CalculiX solver with Coreform Cubit for pre- and post-processing. It allows exporting results to ParaView formats (.frd, .dat) for visualization.

tools.name: ccx2paraview
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from CalculiX results to ParaView VTK/VTU format
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that converts CalculiX analysis results (.frd files) into ParaView-compatible VTK/VTU formats, enabling advanced post-processing and visualization of FEA data.

tools.name: CTK
tools.one_line_profile: Common support code library for medical imaging and surgical navigation
tools.detailed_description: A set of common support code for medical imaging, surgical navigation, and related purposes. It provides libraries for DICOM, widgets, and plugin frameworks used in medical applications.

tools.name: aphros
tools.one_line_profile: Finite volume solver for incompressible multiphase flows with surface tension
tools.detailed_description: A finite volume solver designed for incompressible multiphase flows, specifically handling surface tension and foaming flows in complex geometries. It is used for CFD simulations.

tools.name: dmdtools
tools.one_line_profile: Library for computing variants of Dynamic Mode Decomposition (DMD)
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing tools for computing various forms of Dynamic Mode Decomposition (DMD), a data-driven method for analyzing the dynamics of nonlinear systems, commonly used in fluid dynamics.

tools.name: datafold
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for data-driven modeling and system identification using EDMD and Diffusion Maps
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for data-driven modeling of dynamical systems. It implements Extended Dynamic Mode Decomposition (EDMD) for system identification and Diffusion Maps for manifold learning, useful in fluid dynamics and physics.

tools.name: dicom2stl
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to extract STL surfaces from DICOM image series
tools.detailed_description: A Python script/tool designed to convert medical DICOM image series into STL surface meshes, facilitating 3D printing or further geometric processing of medical data.

tools.name: Activiz.NET
tools.one_line_profile: .NET wrapper for the Visualization Toolkit (VTK)
tools.detailed_description: A .NET wrapper for VTK (Visualization Toolkit), enabling the use of VTK's scientific visualization capabilities within .NET applications.

tools.name: vtk-dicom
tools.one_line_profile: DICOM support library for VTK
tools.detailed_description: A set of classes for using DICOM medical imaging data within the VTK (Visualization Toolkit) environment, providing enhanced DICOM reading, writing, and metadata handling capabilities.

tools.name: ArepoVTK
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization toolkit for AREPO cosmological simulations
tools.detailed_description: A ray-tracing Voronoi tessellation volume renderer designed specifically for visualizing data from AREPO, a moving-mesh code for cosmological hydrodynamical simulations.

tools.name: stpyvista
tools.one_line_profile: Streamlit component for PyVista 3D visualizations
tools.detailed_description: A tool that enables embedding PyVista 3D scientific visualizations directly into Streamlit web applications, facilitating the creation of interactive scientific dashboards.

tools.name: vtkio
tools.one_line_profile: VTK file parser and writer library for Rust
tools.detailed_description: A Rust library for parsing and writing Visualization ToolKit (VTK) files, enabling Rust-based scientific applications to interact with standard scientific visualization data formats.

tools.name: Mayavi
tools.one_line_profile: 3D scientific data visualization and plotting in Python
tools.detailed_description: A powerful and interactive 3D scientific visualization tool and library for Python. It provides a high-level interface to VTK and is widely used for visualizing scalar, vector, and tensor fields.

tools.name: podrbf_nirom
tools.one_line_profile: Non-intrusive reduced order models using POD and RBF for shallow water equations
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for developing non-intrusive reduced order models (NIROM) for shallow water equations using Proper Orthogonal Decomposition (POD) and Radial Basis Function (RBF) interpolation. Developed by ERDC.

tools.name: DMDpack
tools.one_line_profile: A Python package for Dynamic Mode Decomposition (DMD) variants
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Dynamic Mode Decomposition (DMD) algorithms for analyzing dynamical systems and fluid flow data, including standard DMD and randomized variants.

tools.name: FlowCytometryTools
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization and analysis of high-throughput flow cytometry data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for the analysis and visualization of flow cytometry data, supporting gating, transformation, and plotting of high-throughput datasets.

tools.name: f3d
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and minimalist 3D viewer for scientific meshes and point clouds
tools.detailed_description: A fast, minimalist, cross-platform 3D viewer that supports many file formats (VTK, STL, PLY, OBJ, etc.) commonly used in scientific visualization and CAD.

tools.name: flowiz
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for optical flow files
tools.detailed_description: A utility to convert and visualize optical flow files (.flo), commonly used in computer vision and fluid motion estimation research, into images or videos.

tools.name: graph4nlp
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Graph Neural Networks in NLP
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning library for applying Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) to Natural Language Processing tasks, facilitating research in graph-based NLP modeling.

tools.name: VortexFitting
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for detection, identification and fitting of vortices
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for detecting and characterizing vortices in fluid flow data, including fitting vortex models to velocity fields.

tools.name: h2o-2
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable machine learning platform (Legacy version)
tools.detailed_description: The legacy version (H2O-2) of the H2O distributed machine learning platform, used for data analysis and predictive modeling.

tools.name: matlab-DMD
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB implementation of Dynamic Mode Decomposition
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB library implementing Dynamic Mode Decomposition (DMD) for analyzing fluid dynamics and other time-series data.

tools.name: odmd
tools.one_line_profile: Online and Window Dynamic Mode Decomposition
tools.detailed_description: Python implementation of Online DMD and Window DMD algorithms for real-time or streaming analysis of dynamical systems.

tools.name: atomizationFoam
tools.one_line_profile: Spray atomization simulation solver for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: An OpenFOAM solver coupling Volume-of-Fluid (VOF) and Lagrangian Particle Tracking (LPT) for simulating spray atomization processes.

tools.name: KQCircuits
tools.one_line_profile: KLayout Python library for integrated quantum circuit design
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating KLayout macros and PCells for superconducting quantum circuits, facilitating the design and fabrication of quantum processors.

tools.name: EMC-ParaView
tools.one_line_profile: ParaView plugins for Earth Model Collaboration data
tools.detailed_description: A set of Python programmable filters and sources for ParaView to visualize EMC netCDF and GeoCSV models for Earth Science research.

tools.name: poseviz
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Human Pose Visualizer for Python
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight visualization tool for 3D human pose estimation results, useful in biomechanics and computer vision research.

tools.name: IMAS-ParaView
tools.one_line_profile: ParaView plugins for visualizing IMAS fusion data
tools.detailed_description: ParaView plugins developed by the ITER Organization for visualizing General Grid Descriptions (GGDs) and other data adhering to the IMAS (Integrated Modelling and Analysis Suite) standard.

tools.name: PlutoVista.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization library for Pluto notebooks using vtk.js
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library providing interactive 1D, 2D, and 3D visualizations in Pluto notebooks, leveraging plotly.js and vtk.js for scientific data plotting.

tools.name: SciBlend-Core
tools.one_line_profile: Bridge between ParaView and Blender for high-quality scientific visualization
tools.detailed_description: A Blender add-on that facilitates the import of scientific visualization data from ParaView into Blender. It streamlines the process of setting up scenes and animations for high-fidelity rendering of CFD and physics simulation results.

tools.name: DiffGeoOps
tools.one_line_profile: Discrete differential geometry operators for triangulated 2-manifolds
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of discrete differential-geometry operators (such as curvature estimation) for triangulated surfaces, based on the paper by Meyer et al. Useful for geometric analysis of meshes in physics simulations.

tools.name: MidSurfer
tools.one_line_profile: ParaView plugin for extracting mid-surfaces from volumetric masks
tools.detailed_description: A ParaView plugin developed by KAUST Vislab designed to extract mid-surfaces from binary segmentation masks. This is particularly useful in analyzing thin structures in volumetric scientific data.

tools.name: POD-RBF
tools.one_line_profile: Reduced Order Modeling using POD and Radial Basis Functions
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for constructing Reduced Order Models (ROMs) using Proper Orthogonal Decomposition (POD) coupled with Radial Basis Function (RBF) networks. It is used for accelerating physics simulations and flow field reconstruction.

tools.name: vedo
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific analysis and visualization of 3D data
tools.detailed_description: A powerful Python module for scientific analysis and visualization of 3D objects and point clouds. It is based on VTK and NumPy, providing a high-level interface for handling meshes, volumes, and simulations in physics and engineering.

tools.name: MODULO
tools.one_line_profile: Multiscale Modal Analysis software for numerical and experimental data
tools.detailed_description: MODULO (MODal mULtiscale pOd) is a software package developed at the von Karman Institute for performing Multiscale Modal Analysis on numerical and experimental datasets using the Multiscale Proper Orthogonal Decomposition (mPOD) method. It aids in decomposing complex flow fields into dominant modes.

tools.name: pv_atmos
tools.one_line_profile: ParaView scripting for atmospheric netCDF data visualization
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to facilitate the visualization of atmospheric science data (specifically netCDF formats) using ParaView. It provides scripts and utilities to handle specific atmospheric data structures and rendering requirements.

tools.name: apyce-project
tools.one_line_profile: 3D visualization wrapper for reservoir grids
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based Builder/Eclipse wrapper designed for the 3D visualization of reservoir grids. It serves as a tool for reservoir engineering to visualize simulation data and grid structures.

tools.name: swSim
tools.one_line_profile: Solid Wave Simulation for ultrasonic NDE
tools.detailed_description: Solid Wave Simulation (swSim) solves heterogeneous, anisotropic elastodynamic equations for ultrasonic Non-Destructive Evaluation (NDE) simulation. It uses a time-explicit staggered grid finite difference scheme accelerated by GPUs and outputs data in VTK format.

tools.name: surf-ice
tools.one_line_profile: GLSL surface rendering tool for neuroimaging and mesh formats
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool for surface rendering using GLSL. It supports a wide range of scientific mesh and tractography formats (NIfTI, GIfTI, VTK, OBJ, etc.), primarily used in neuroimaging but applicable to general mesh visualization.

tools.name: gwpv
tools.one_line_profile: Gravitational wave data visualization with ParaView
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for visualizing gravitational wave simulation data using ParaView. It provides specific data loaders and rendering configurations for astrophysical simulations.

tools.name: meshio
tools.one_line_profile: I/O for many mesh formats
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library for reading and writing unstructured meshes in various formats (VTK, Gmsh, ANSYS, Abaqus, etc.). It is a fundamental tool for data conversion and pre/post-processing in computational physics.

tools.name: OMD
tools.one_line_profile: Matlab package for Optimal Mode Decomposition (OMD) and DMD
tools.detailed_description: A Matlab package developed by the Oxford Control Group for computing Optimal Mode Decomposition (OMD) and Dynamic Mode Decomposition (DMD). It is used for analyzing dynamics in fluid flows and other time-series data.

tools.name: PyEVTK
tools.one_line_profile: Export data to binary VTK files
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that allows exporting data to binary VTK files for visualization and data analysis. It supports various VTK formats (RectilinearGrid, StructuredGrid, UnstructuredGrid, etc.) and is widely used in scientific computing pipelines.

tools.name: gcode2vtk
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for 3D printer G-code files to VTK format for visualization
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool that converts G-code (numerical control programming language used in 3D printing) into VTK files, enabling the visualization of printing paths and layers in scientific visualization software like ParaView.

tools.name: dash-vtk
tools.one_line_profile: Library for integrating VTK visualization into Dash web applications
tools.detailed_description: A component library that brings vtk.js visualization capabilities into the Dash framework, allowing scientists and engineers to build interactive web-based 3D visualization tools for scientific data.

tools.name: PRISMA2020
tools.one_line_profile: R package to produce PRISMA-2020 compliant flow diagrams for systematic reviews
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to generate flow diagrams that comply with the PRISMA 2020 statement, widely used in scientific research for reporting systematic reviews and meta-analyses.

tools.name: SKDMD
tools.one_line_profile: Sparsity-promoting Kernel Dynamic Mode Decomposition for nonlinear systems
tools.detailed_description: A Python package implementing Sparsity-promoting Kernel Dynamic Mode Decomposition (SKDMD), a data-driven modeling technique used for analyzing nonlinear dynamical systems in physics and engineering.

tools.name: nuscenes_viz
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for NuScenes dataset using Mayavi
tools.detailed_description: A specialized tool for visualizing the NuScenes autonomous driving dataset (Lidar, Radar, Camera data) in 3D using the Mayavi scientific visualization engine.

tools.name: PyVista
tools.one_line_profile: Streamlined interface for the Visualization Toolkit (VTK)
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library that provides a high-level interface to the Visualization Toolkit (VTK), simplifying 3D plotting, mesh analysis, and scientific visualization tasks.

tools.name: pyvista-xarray
tools.one_line_profile: Xarray DataArray accessors for PyVista integration
tools.detailed_description: A library that provides an interface between xarray (labeled multi-dimensional arrays) and PyVista, enabling direct visualization of xarray data structures in 3D scientific plots.

tools.name: PyVistaQt
tools.one_line_profile: Qt support for PyVista visualization
tools.detailed_description: A helper library that enables the embedding of PyVista 3D visualizations within Qt (PyQt/PySide) applications, facilitating the creation of custom scientific GUI tools.

tools.name: QuickVtk
tools.one_line_profile: VTK prototyping application based on QtQuick/QML
tools.detailed_description: An interactive application designed for rapid prototyping and testing of VTK visualization pipelines using a QML-based interface, useful for developing scientific visualization workflows.

tools.name: ParaView_Reader_for_LIGGGHTS
tools.one_line_profile: ParaView reader plugin for LIGGGHTS dump files
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for ParaView that allows direct reading and visualization of dump files generated by LIGGGHTS (a Discrete Element Method particle simulation software).

tools.name: CFD_AR_VR
tools.one_line_profile: Multiplatform processing of CFD simulations with AR/VR
tools.detailed_description: A toolset for processing and visualizing Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) simulation data in Augmented Reality (AR) and Virtual Reality (VR) environments.

tools.name: cfd-xyz-viewer
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based viewer for parametric CFD simulation results
tools.detailed_description: An open-source web application designed to generate and visualize parametric Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) results, facilitating easy access and sharing of simulation data.

tools.name: PointCloudTools
tools.one_line_profile: Windows tool for point cloud processing and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A visualization and processing tool for point cloud data (.pcd, .ply, .obj) based on PCL and VTK. It supports filtering, feature extraction, segmentation, and coordinate transformation (WGS84 to UTM).

tools.name: Starviewer
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-platform medical imaging software
tools.detailed_description: A cross-platform open-source medical imaging software dedicated to DICOM image viewing and analysis, suitable for medical physics and diagnostic visualization.

tools.name: POD-DL-ROM
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based reduced order modeling for PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A framework for enhancing deep learning-based reduced order models (DL-ROM) for nonlinear parametrized Partial Differential Equations (PDEs) using Proper Orthogonal Decomposition (POD).

tools.name: sunkit-pyvista
tools.one_line_profile: 3D visualization of solar physics data using PyVista
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for visualizing solar physics data in 3D, bridging the SunPy ecosystem with the PyVista visualization engine.

tools.name: VTKFortran
tools.one_line_profile: Pure Fortran library for VTK XML output
tools.detailed_description: A pure Fortran library that provides an API to write data in VTK XML formats, facilitating visualization of scientific simulations written in Fortran.

tools.name: paraview-meshio
tools.one_line_profile: ParaView plugin for generic mesh I/O
tools.detailed_description: A ParaView plugin that leverages the meshio library to read and write a wide variety of unstructured mesh formats, enhancing ParaView's interoperability.

tools.name: turbulucid
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for visualizing 2D CFD datasets
tools.detailed_description: A specialized Python package designed for the visualization of 2-dimensional Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) datasets, likely supporting standard formats.

tools.name: Holo
tools.one_line_profile: HoloLens application for 3D medical data visualization
tools.detailed_description: A tool to visualize animated 3D medical data using Microsoft HoloLens, enabling shared augmented reality experiences for medical analysis.

tools.name: TTK
tools.one_line_profile: Topological Data Analysis and Visualization library
tools.detailed_description: The Topology ToolKit (TTK) is an open-source library for topological data analysis and visualization, widely used in fluid dynamics and material science for feature extraction.

tools.name: jupyterview
tools.one_line_profile: VTK data visualization extension for JupyterLab
tools.detailed_description: A JupyterLab extension that enables interactive visualization of VTK data directly within Jupyter notebooks, facilitating scientific data exploration.

tools.name: 4d-ptv
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for 4D Particle Tracking Velocimetry
tools.detailed_description: A general toolbox for 4D Particle Tracking Velocimetry (PTV), allowing the tracking of Lagrangian tracers in fluid flows in both space and time.

tools.name: VtkFbxConverter
tools.one_line_profile: ParaView exporter plugin for FBX files
tools.detailed_description: A ParaView plugin that enables exporting scientific visualization scenes to the FBX format, facilitating import into 3D modeling and animation software.

tools.name: snapshot_pod_rom_py
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of Proper Orthogonal Decomposition (POD) for Reduced Order Models
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to calculate Proper Orthogonal Decomposition (POD) modes from observational snapshots and generate Reduced Order Models (ROM) for system dynamics, commonly used in fluid dynamics analysis.

tools.name: 3D_Medical_Imaging
tools.one_line_profile: Blood vessel segmentation tool for 3D medical images
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool for segmenting blood vessels from 3D medical imaging data, applicable in bio-fluid dynamics and medical physics analysis.

tools.name: VisIt
